translation.en: Oh, fuck.
I wasn't trying to escape.
No, please.
Don't. Don't.
I don't want to die.
Oh, yeah. Yeah, I'll make you clean.
I'm sorry.
I didn't-- I didn't mean to....
Hey, sis.
-Time is it? -Just after 8.
-You want me to make coffee? -No, I gotta go. I'll call you later.
translation.es: ¿Quieres café? No, tengo que irme. Te llamaré después.

translation.en: You sure there's nothing I can do?
Angie, everything's gonna be fine. Just go back to sleep.
translation.es: Todo está bien. Vuelve a dormir.

translation.en: All right, I'm coming, I'm coming.
Lorenzo Sapelli. I've been waiting for you. Come on in.
Thanks.
-How long you been working here? -All together...
...15 years.
You were here for the fire?
Devastating.
Entire building up in flames.
It's been five years since the fire.
translation.es: Han pasado cinco años desde el incendio.

translation.en: They're still in a legal battle with the insurance companies.
translation.es: Aún hay una demanda contra las aseguradoras.

translation.en: Even cleaning up this mess is impossible.
translation.es: Ni siquiera han podido limpiar todo.

translation.en: I've given up faith about reopening, and besides...
translation.es: Ya perdí la esperanza de reabrir, y además...

translation.en: ...who'd ever want to shop here after everything that's happened?
translation.es: ...¿quién querría venir de compras aquí después de todo lo ocurrido?

translation.en: You know, the Meredith family acquired this building...
translation.es: La familia Meredith compró este edificio...

translation.en: ...after St. Matthew's Hospital closed in 1952.
translation.es: ...después de que el hospital cerró en 1952.

translation.en: It was the very first Mayflower to open on the East Coast.
translation.es: Fue la primera tienda Mayflower de la Costa Este.

translation.en: The company wants us to patrol the premises every couple of hours.
translation.es: La compañía quiere que vigilemos el lugar cada dos horas...

translation.en: But I do my rounds every three, that's more than enough.
Anyway, you'll see, not too much going on. It's pretty calm around here.
translation.es: Ya lo verás, no sucede nada por aquí.

translation.en: Well, there you go.
Perfume and Cosmetics Department, what's left of it anyway.
translation.es: El departamento de perfumería, lo que queda de él.

translation.en: Thank God you didn't show up any later. This place gives me the creeps at night.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios no llegaste más tarde. Este lugar me asusta de noche.

translation.en: No electricity.
All these mirrors.
Best to keep your eyes away from them.
translation.es: Será mejor que no los mires.

translation.en: You polish them?
-I'm sorry? -The mirrors, they're so clean.
No, that's Gary. Gary Lewis.
Fella who was working here before you.
translation.es: El sujeto que trabajaba aquí antes que tú.

translation.en: He was completely obsessed with these damn mirrors.
translation.es: Estaba obsesionado con los malditos espejos.

translation.en: Spent the entire night cleaning them.
How long has it been since you left the N.Y.P.D.?
translation.es: ¿Hace cuánto dejaste el departamento de policía?

translation.en: About a year.
I know it's none of my business, but...
translation.es: Sé que no es de mi incumbencia, pero...

translation.en: ...why did you resign from the force?
You used to be a detective, is that correct?
Yeah.
I'm sorry.
I always been too curious.
It's all right.
There was a pretty big team working here before the fire.
translation.es: Trabajaba mucha gente aquí antes del incendio.

translation.en: You know, when you stop to think... ...of all the department stores in New York...
translation.es: Cuando piensas en todas las tiendas de Nueva York...

translation.en: ...this one was the most beautiful, the most luxurious.
translation.es: ...esta era la más hermosa y lujosa.

translation.en: I mean, it breaks your heart, it really does.
translation.es: Me parte el corazón, en serio.

translation.en: Well, here you go.
This is where you'll be spending most of your time.
translation.es: Ahí pasarás la mayor parte del tiempo.

translation.en: At least you got electricity in here.
It's warm, it's nice.
You've even got a TV.
I opened up the trunk, where he so-called hid the pictures.
translation.es: Abrí el portaequipaje, donde intentó ocultar los cuadros.

translation.en: I grabbed the goody bag, walked to the backyard...
translation.es: Tomé la bolsa, fui al jardín...

translation.en: ...opened up the barbecue grill, I grabbed the lighter fluid....
Hello?
-Hello. -Hey, Rosa. How are you doing?
I'm fine. Let me help you.
Thanks.
-Where are the kids? -Upstairs with Señor Ben.
translation.es: ¿Y los niños? Arriba, con el señor Ben.

translation.en: Thanks.
So, everybody at my school thinks this boy named Eamon...
translation.es: En la escuela piensan que un chico llamado Eamon...

translation.en: ...which is like one of my best friends, which is a boy, likes me.
translation.es: ...uno de mis mejores amigos, gusta de mí.

translation.en: And this girl named Christiana, who liked him, is just now gossiping.
translation.es: Él le gusta a Christiana, y ella está chismorreando.

translation.en: You want me to talk to Mrs. Ward?
She'll make them want to wrap me up in toilet paper for Halloween.
translation.es: No, si ella les dice algo, me envolverán en papel higiénico en Halloween.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
Look, Mommy. Look what Daddy got me.
translation.es: Mami, mira lo que me trajo papi.

translation.en: It looks great. You'll have to show me how it works later.
translation.es: Es lindo. Después me mostrarás cómo funciona, ¿sí?

translation.en: It's so fast, Mommy.
Ben? Can I talk to you?
Yeah.
You two. You need to finish homework. You need to get ready for your bath.
translation.es: Terminen su tarea y vayan a ducharse.

translation.en: -No fooling around, let's go. -Okay, let's go, Michael.
translation.es: Vamos. No pierdan tiempo. Bien. Ven, Michael.

translation.en: Hey. Come here.
Happy, happy birthday.
-Thanks, Dad. -Yeah.
Hey.
-What is this? -What?
I've asked you not to drop by without calling.
translation.es: Te dije que no vinieras sin avisar.

translation.en: You won't answer my calls.
-I don't want to argue. -I don't want to argue.
If you're not gonna answer my calls, what--?
I haven't had a drink for three months.
translation.es: No he bebido nada en tres meses.

translation.en: Since you won't answer, how would you know?
translation.es: Pero como no contestas, ¿cómo lo sabrías?

translation.en: I don't want to know.
What I want is for you to respect my needs.
I'm doing everything I can to respect your needs.
translation.es: Hago lo que puedo para respetarlas.

translation.en: I haven't had a drink.
I got a new job to hold me over till I'm reinstated.
I'm doing everything I can to get back on my feet again.
translation.es: Hago lo que puedo para recuperarme.

translation.en: What?
You don't think people can change?
We're not talking about people. We're talking about you.
translation.es: No hablamos de otras personas. Hablamos de ti.

translation.en: Amy, I killed a man.
You don't just get over that.
I needed time. I needed you.
translation.es: Necesitaba tiempo. Te necesitaba a ti.

translation.en: -I was right here. -Yeah. Judging me like everybody else.
translation.es: -Yo estaba contigo. -Sí. Juzgándome como los demás.

translation.en: How dare you say that to me.
I was the only one at the precinct who defended you.
translation.es: Fui la única en la jefatura que te defendió.

translation.en: How many times did I chase reporters off our front lawn?
translation.es: ¿Cuántas veces eché reporteros de nuestra entrada?

translation.en: How can you say that to me?
I've always been in your corner. I've been the only one who believed in you.
You're fucking unbelievable!
Please, I didn't come here to fight.
translation.es: Por favor, no vine a pelear.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry that I came over without calling.
I just wanted to see them.
-But we have to set up some rules. -What fucking rules?
Come on, Amy, just tell me what rules I need to follow...
translation.es: ¡Vamos, Amy, dime qué malditas reglas tengo que seguir...

translation.en: ...so I can see my son on his birthday!
translation.es: ...para ver a mi hijo en su cumpleaños!

translation.en: Look at yourself.
This is exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.es: Eso es lo que me preocupa.

translation.en: I don't know how you're going to be from one moment to the next.
When I get around you, I get... ...nervous.
translation.es: Cuando estoy cerca de ti, me pongo nervioso.

translation.en: Because I am so scared that I am losing you.
And I screw everything up.
translation.es: Y siempre lo echo a perder.

translation.en: I've missed you so much. I miss you too.
Amy, we deserve another chance.
I know how much I love you, and I know somewhere inside there...
translation.es: Sé lo mucho que te amo, y sé que de algún modo...

translation.en: ...you love me too.
Please.
Please.
I can't do this.
I can't do this, Ben.
Holy shit.
What the hell?
Fuck!
What the...?
You should stop taking those pills.
Jesus!
How are you doing today?
I'm fine. I feel a lot better. I'm leaving in a couple of minutes.
translation.es: Bien. Me siento mucho mejor. Me iré en unos minutos.

translation.en: -Are you sure you're all right? -Please, not you.
translation.es: ¿Seguro que estás bien? Por favor, tú no.

translation.en: Okay. I'm just saying, you can talk to me if you want.
translation.es: Bien. Solo digo que puedes hablar conmigo si quieres.

translation.en: I'm your little sister.
-It's that new job, isn't it? -Yeah, well, I need that new job.
translation.es: Es tu nuevo empleo, ¿verdad? Sí, bueno, lo necesito.

translation.en: I can't take care of Amy, and the kids, and myself on my pension.
translation.es: No puedo hacerme cargo de Amy, los niños y de mí con la pensión.

translation.en: I'm not gonna sleep on your couch for the rest of my life.
translation.es: No dormiré en tu sillón el resto de mi vida.

translation.en: Okay, well, maybe you get a daytime job, a regular job.
translation.es: Quizá consigas un trabajo durante el día.

translation.en: It's not that simple.
Well, you should think about it.
Ben! What happened?
Just leave me alone.
Please, just leave me alone!
Angie, get out of here! Now!
What is happening to you, Ben?
Pull yourself together.
Help!
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
No!
Hello?
Hello?
Where are you?
I want to help you, but I need to know where you are!
translation.es: Quiero ayudarte, ¡pero debo saber dónde estás!

translation.en: Damn it!
I'm coming!
Anybody here?
Is anybody in here?
Fuck this place.
Mom! Mom! Mom!
Mom! Mom!
Michael? Are you okay? What's happening?
Michael. What's the matter, sweetie?
-There's a lady screaming. -Where?
There, in the mirror. In the mirror?
I don't see anybody but you and I in the mirror.
translation.es: No veo a nadie en el espejo, salvo nosotros.

translation.en: -You just had a nightmare, sweetie. -Okay.
Sometimes they can feel really real, but they're not, all right?
translation.es: A veces parecen muy reales, pero no lo son, ¿sí?

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay, let's go back to sleep.
Come on. In you go.
I'm right around the corner, all right?
Love you.
I love you too, sweetie.
Can you leave the door open?
Sure, sweetheart.
You two go back to sleep, okay? All right, Mom.
--not clear how it happened.
The 42-year old is expected to go on trial this month for allegedly...
translation.es: El sujeto de 42 años irá a juicio el mes próximo por presunta...

translation.en: ...sexually assaulting a former co-worker in her apartment...
translation.es: ...violación contra una compañera de trabajo en su apartamento...

translation.en: ...for 13 hours on Halloween night in 2005.
translation.es: ...durante 13 horas la noche de Halloween en 2005.

translation.en: Braunstein's lawyer says his client was mentally ill at the time.
translation.es: El abogado de Braunstein dice que su cliente no estaba en su sano juicio.

translation.en: The feds say they'll seek the death penalty against a former mob boss...
translation.es: El FBI dice que pide la pena de muerte para un jefe delincuente...

translation.en: ...accused of ordering a hit on a rival.
translation.es: ...acusado de pedir la muerte de un rival.

translation.en: The trial of Vincent "Vinny Gorgeous"....
I swear to you, I could feel my flesh burning.
translation.es: Te lo juro, me quemaba la piel.

translation.en: I couldn't breathe. It was like my lungs were full of smoke.
translation.es: No podía respirar. Sentía los pulmones llenos de humo.

translation.en: It was like a nightmare but I was awake. I know I was awake.
translation.es: Era como una pesadilla, pero despierto. Sé que estaba despierto.

translation.en: You think I'm crazy, don't you?
I don't know what to think. I think you're going through...
translation.es: No sé qué creer. Estás pasando...

translation.en: ...a hard time in your life. You're under a lot of stress.
translation.es: ...por un momento difícil. Estás bajo mucha presión.

translation.en: You've been having those nightmares since the shooting.
translation.es: Has tenido pesadillas desde el tiroteo.

translation.en: You know it wasn't your fault.
translation.es: Sabes que no fue tu culpa.

translation.en: They're everywhere.
-What are you talking about? -The fucking mirrors, they are everywhere.
In the department store, on the corner of every street...
translation.es: En la tienda departamental, en cada esquina...

translation.en: ...in the window of every building in this city. I f--
translation.es: ...en las ventanas de todos los edificios.

translation.en: I feel like I'm not the one looking into the mirrors...
translation.es: Siento... No soy yo el que mira los espejos...

translation.en: ...but they're looking back at me.
translation.es: ...sino que alguien dentro de ellos me mira a mí.

translation.en: There's no one looking back at you through the mirrors.
translation.es: Nadie te mira a través de los espejos.

translation.en: You're obviously.... You're still conflicted about what happened.
translation.es: Obviamente... Sigues estresado por lo que pasó.

translation.en: Maybe you need to talk to someone.
A professional. Someone....
Mirrors are just glass and silver, Ben, that's it.
translation.es: Los espejos son solo vidrio y plata, Ben. Eso es todo.

translation.en: There's nothing behind them.
translation.es: No hay nada detrás de ellos.

translation.en: Will you please go get some sleep, okay?
I love you.
Coming!
Hold on!
-Mr. Carson? -Yeah.
You want to sign here, please?
You have a good day, sir.
Thanks.
Holy shit.
Lorenzo, I need to talk to you.
I just had the craziest day here. Your ex-colleagues came to pay us a visit.
translation.es: Hoy fue un día extraño. Tus antiguos colegas vinieron a vernos.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
You know Gary, the guy who was working here before you?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas a Gary, el que trabajaba aquí antes de ti?

translation.en: Yeah.
Cops found him dead in a subway station in Harlem.
translation.es: La Policía lo encontró muerto... ...en una estación de subterráneo en Harlem.

translation.en: I never liked him too much, but poor guy, he didn't deserve to go like that.
translation.es: No me agradaba mucho, pero, pobre, no merecía morir así.

translation.en: -Did they tell you the cause of death? -What?
-Did they tell you how he died? -No, they wouldn't tell me.
translation.es: -¿Te dijeron cómo murió? -No, no me dijeron nada.

translation.en: Mrs. Sapelli is waiting for me at home. I gotta go.
translation.es: La señora Sapelli me espera en casa. Debo irme.

translation.en: By the way, about that leak in the basement...
translation.es: Por cierto, acerca de la filtración en el sótano.

translation.en: ...they're sending someone over to work on that, beginning of next week.
translation.es: Enviarán a alguien que la arregle la semana que viene.

translation.en: We have a white male, 50 years of age, name unknown.
Following the completion of the external examination...
translation.es: De acuerdo a la revisión externa...

translation.en: ...the body was washed and lightly dried.
translation.es: ...el cuerpo fue lavado y levemente secado.

translation.en: A Y-incision was made from the bilateral clavicular joints...
translation.es: Una incisión en forma de Y en las articulaciones de la clavícula...

translation.en: ...to the xiphoid process.
-The tissue was waterlogged-- -Amy.
Yes, what is it?
There's someone in the lobby for you. It sounds urgent.
translation.es: Alguien te busca en la recepción. Parece urgente.

translation.en: Ben. What's happening? What are you doing here?
Thanks for seeing me. Look, I need to ask you a favor.
translation.es: Gracias por recibirme. Necesito un favor.

translation.en: -I'm in the middle of work. -I know.
Twenty minutes. Yesterday morning you picked up a body.
translation.es: Solo 20 minutos. Ayer por la mañana recogieron un cadáver.

translation.en: Gary Lewis. I just need to take a look at him.
-Who is he? -A night watchman at the Mayflower.
I replaced him.
How do you have his driver's license?
I found his wallet in the department store. I just need to know how he died.
translation.es: Encontré su billetera en la tienda. Necesito saber cómo murió.

translation.en: Why do you need to know how he died?
You've been suspended, you're not supposed to be doing any investigations.
translation.es: Ben, te suspendieron. No debes hacer ninguna investigación.

translation.en: Listen to me, this is serious.
There are some very strange things happening over at the Mayflower.
translation.es: Están ocurriendo cosas extrañas en Mayflower.

translation.en: I can't explain what it's--
This guy Gary Lewis sent me a package right before he died.
translation.es: Gary Lewis me envió un paquete justo antes de morir.

translation.en: Thing is, I never met him before.
Inside the package were all these articles on the Mayflower, on the fire.
translation.es: Dentro del paquete había unos artículos sobre el incendio en Mayflower.

translation.en: Like he was trying to tell me something, or warn me about something.
translation.es: Pareciera que trataba de decirme algo o de advertirme.

translation.en: I need to figure this out. Please.
translation.es: Necesito saber qué es. Por favor.

translation.en: Gary Lewis, Gary Lewis. There he is, B-16.
He slashed his throat.
Well, there you go, there's your answer. Your man committed suicide.
translation.es: Bien, esa es tu respuesta. Tu amigo se suicidó.

translation.en: You get a lot of suicide cases with people that slash their own throats?
translation.es: ¿Conoces a muchos suicidas que se corten la garganta?

translation.en: I didn't think so. Excuse me.
All I know is, the police are still investigating this one.
translation.es: Solo sé que la Policía sigue investigándolo.

translation.en: -That's why we still have the body. -What did he use to cut his throat?
translation.es: -Por eso aún está aquí. -¿Con qué se cortó la garganta?

translation.en: A piece of a mirror.
He probably broke the mirror into pieces...
...so he'd have something to cut himself with.
Seven years bad luck.
translation.es: Son siete años de mala suerte.

translation.en: Are you okay, Ben?
I'm fine.
I'm sorry, excuse me.
I need to see his file.
-What? -I need his file.
What's the problem? I just need to see his file.
Calm down. You're not even supposed to be down here.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Tú no deberías estar aquí...

translation.en: Now you want to look at somebody's file?
Look, I'll be off then. Amy, you know where to find me if you need me.
translation.es: Tengo que irme. Amy, sabes dónde encontrarme si me necesitas.

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks, Peter. I appreciate it.
translation.es: Sí. Gracias por tu ayuda, Peter.

translation.en: I want you to leave now. I'm serious, Ben.
translation.es: Quiero que te marches. Hablo en serio.

translation.en: Amy, I'm sorry.
I can't leave here until I see that file.
translation.es: No puedo irme hasta ver el expediente.

translation.en: It's important, please.
Please.
Amy. Come here and look at this picture.
translation.es: Amy, ven a ver esta fotografía.

translation.en: Look at the piece of mirror that Gary Lewis is holding.
translation.es: Mira el pedazo de espejo que él sostiene.

translation.en: And look at it up here in its reflected image in the other mirror.
translation.es: Mira aquí la imagen que se refleja.

translation.en: It's full of blood.
Yet in reality, it's perfectly clean. Not a single drop on it.
translation.es: Pero esta está completamente limpia. Ni una sola gota, ni una sola gota.

translation.en: It's probably the angle from which the photograph was taken.
translation.es: Quizá fue por el ángulo de donde se tomó la fotografía.

translation.en: What are you trying to prove?
What if the mirrors are showing us something that's not really happening?
translation.es: ¿Y si los espejos nos muestran algo que no pasó en realidad?

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Just listen to me.
What if the mirrors are reflecting something that's beyond our reality?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si los espejos nos muestran algo que está más allá de nuestra realidad?

translation.en: What if the mirrors can actually make us do things that we don't want to do?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si nos obligan a hacer cosas que no queremos?

translation.en: Like making Gary Lewis slit his own throat.
translation.es: Como hacer que él se corte la garganta.

translation.en: Ben, listen to yourself. You can't talk like that around here.
translation.es: Ben, escúchate. No puedes hablar así aquí.

translation.en: Don't you want to get reinstated?
Amy, I'm seeing things in the mirrors at work, bad things.
translation.es: Amy, veo cosas en los espejos del trabajo, cosas malas.

translation.en: To the point where I can feel what they're showing me.
translation.es: Al grado que siento lo que me están mostrando.

translation.en: Ben, you're driving me fucking crazy!
I don't have time for this.
What's wrong with you?
Do you think I'm making this up? Do you think I'm fucking lying?
translation.es: ¿Crees que lo estoy inventando? ¿Crees que miento?

translation.en: What medication are you taking to stop drinking?
translation.es: ¿Qué medicamento tomas para dejar de beber?

translation.en: That's a strong drug.
It has a lot of serious side effects. How many pills are you taking a day?
translation.es: Tiene graves efectos secundarios. ¿Cuántas píldoras tomas al día?

translation.en: I'm sorry that I bothered you.
You're right.
Thanks for trying to help.
--at night at this bar, it's a couple blocks from here.
translation.es: ...de noche en un bar. A pocas cuadras de aquí.

translation.en: All right. Where's the body?
-How am I gonna calm down? -Let the detective by. Step over here.
And there's a guy been living with her at her place.
All right. You say she works at this bar? At night?
translation.es: Bien, ¿dice que trabajaba en un bar? ¿De noche?

translation.en: Yeah, she works nights.
She comes home late. I don't see her come home.
translation.es: Llegaba tarde, nunca la veía llegar.

translation.en: She probably closes the bar, right?
Yeah. Because she sleeps during the day, like early morning hours.
translation.es: Sí. Porque dormía durante el día, temprano por la mañana.

translation.en: All right. And....
I saw blood falling from the ceiling. Then she call me.
translation.es: Vi que caía sangre del techo. Luego me llamó.

translation.en: I want you to ask her, did she hear any noises? Any sounds?
translation.es: Quiero que le pregunte si oyó algún ruido.

translation.en: -What's going on? -We'll be with you in just a second.
I live in Apartment 8. I used to be a cop. Just tell me what's going on.
translation.es: Vivo en el departamento ocho. Fui policía. Dígame qué sucede.

translation.en: -Just a second. -I want to talk to the lead detective!
translation.es: -Un segundo. -¡Quiero hablar con el detective a cargo!

translation.en: Angela?
Who is the lead detective? Ben.
Larry, what the hell are you doing here?
-Larry, just tell me what's going on! -Ben, it's not good.
translation.es: -Larry, dime qué es lo que sucede. -Ben, no es algo bueno.

translation.en: Where's Angie?
Where the fuck is my sister? Tell them to let go of me!
translation.es: ¿Dónde está mi hermana? ¡Diles que me suelten!

translation.en: I can't do that, Ben!
Goddamn it!
The water has obliterated most of the marks.
translation.es: El agua borró la mayoría de las huellas.

translation.en: No sign of struggle or forced entry.
translation.es: No hay señales de lucha o de entrada forzosa.

translation.en: And the front door was locked, which means that...
...the person who did this either had keys to the apartment...
translation.es: ...la persona que lo hizo tiene llaves...

translation.en: -...or it was someone that she knew. -He would've never laid a finger on her.
translation.es: -...o era alguien a quien ella conocía. -Él nunca le pondría un dedo encima.

translation.en: You know, when their father died, Ben took care of Angela.
translation.es: Cuando su padre murió, Ben cuidó de Ángela.

translation.en: She meant the world to him.
Listen, so far, his statement is pretty consistent with the facts, you know?
translation.es: Hasta ahora su coartada es sólida.

translation.en: We checked it out. He showed up to work at 7 p.m.
translation.es: Lo investigamos. Fue a trabajar a las 7:00 p.m.

translation.en: The downstairs neighbors said they began to notice the water leakage at around 10.
translation.es: Y los vecinos dicen que notaron una filtración de agua alrededor de las 10:00.

translation.en: The only strange thing, and this could just be a coincidence...
translation.es: Lo único extraño, y que podría ser una coincidencia...

translation.en: ...is that Ben told the daytime security guard, Lorenzo Sapelli...
translation.es: ...es que Ben le dijo al guardia diurno, Lorenzo Sapelli...

translation.en: ...that he was planning on quitting the job.
Like he was moving away some place.
He mention anything like that to you?
Lately, communication hasn't been our strong point.
translation.es: Últimamente, la comunicación no ha sido nuestro fuerte.

translation.en: What are you gonna do with him?
Let him go. We got no reason to keep him.
translation.es: Lo dejaremos ir. No hay motivo para retenerlo.

translation.en: All right.
I'm so sorry.
Ben?
Why don't you come home and spend some days with the kids?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no vas a casa y pasas unos días con tus hijos?

translation.en: I can't.
I don't want to put our children in danger.
translation.es: No quiero poner en peligro a los niños.

translation.en: She asked me to quit, but I wouldn't.
translation.es: Ella me pidió que renunciara, pero yo no quise.

translation.en: They came after her.
What are you talking about?
I've got some things I need to take care of.
Wait, Ben.
-Please. -Amy, let me go.
I don't want you to get in any more trouble. Please, stay out of it.
translation.es: No te metas en más problemas. Por favor quédate fuera de esto.

translation.en: I know who did this.
In that case, you've gotta tell Larry everything.
translation.es: Si es así, debes contarle todo a Larry.

translation.en: He'll never believe me.
Neither will you.
What do you want?
Please, just tell me.
What do you want from me?
What do you want from me?
Esseker.
Hey. I need you to run a name for me. Esseker.
translation.es: Hola. Necesito que investigues un nombre. Esseker.

translation.en: Echo, Sierra, Sierra, Echo, Kilo, Echo, Romeo.
translation.es: Eco, Sierra, Sierra, Eco, Kilo, Eco, Romeo.

translation.en: Did you check online? I've already done that.
Nothing. IRS and DMV.
translation.es: Nada. Ni en Rentas ni en Tránsito.

translation.en: -Where? -Try New York.
-When? -Last five or six years.
Okay, Ben.
Thanks. Get back to me as soon as you can.
translation.es: Gracias. Háblame en cuanto tengas algo.

translation.en: "Mayflower burns, 48 presumed dead."
"Berry confesses deadly Mayflower fire."
"Watchman arrested."
"Woman, three children murdered." Come on, Ben, connect the dots.
translation.es: "Una mujer y sus tres hijos asesinados". Vamos, Ben, resuélvelo.

translation.en: "Mr. Berry maintains that the mirrors in the store are the ones...
translation.es: "El señor Berry sostiene que los espejos de la tienda...

translation.en: ...that brutally killed his wife and three children."
translation.es: ...mataron a su esposa y a los tres niños".

translation.en: "Mirrors are guilty. Mirrors are guilty."
-Yeah. What did you get? -Hey.
Look, I didn't find anything under that name.
translation.es: No encontré a nadie con ese apellido.

translation.en: Shit! Shit.
Do you want me to look outside New York?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que busque fuera de Nueva York?

translation.en: No. Hold on. Hold on.
I want you to run another name for me. Berry, Terrence Berry.
translation.es: Quiero que investigues otro nombre. Terrence Berry.

translation.en: Wait one sec.
I think I got him. You still there?
Yeah.
Your guy murdered his whole family. I already know that.
translation.es: -Este sujeto mató a su familia. -Eso ya lo sé.

translation.en: He's dead.
Damn it.
Can you tell me where he was committed before he died?
translation.es: ¿Puedes decirme dónde estuvo recluido antes de morir?

translation.en: When one starts to perceive one's own reflection as a completely separate being...
translation.es: ¿Sabe, señor Carson? Cuando uno percibe su reflejo... ...como un ser totalmente separado...

translation.en: ...one is suddenly confronted with two entirely separate egos...
...two entirely separate worlds that can surface at any given moment.
translation.es: ...dos mundos distintos que pueden surgir en cualquier momento.

translation.en: A feeling of self-hatred, usually triggered by a psychological shock...
translation.es: Un odio hacia sí mismo, disparado por un trauma psicológico...

translation.en: ...can split the personality in two...
...hence creating two or more personalities with distinct memories...
translation.es: Pueden aparecer dos o más personalidades... ...con memorias separadas...

translation.en: ...and distinct behavior patterns within the same individual.
translation.es: ...y comportamientos distintos dentro del mismo individuo.

translation.en: The patient then has the false perception of the existence...
translation.es: Entonces el paciente tiene la falsa percepción de la existencia...

translation.en: ...of two distinct worlds: the real world and the world inside a mirror.
translation.es: ...de dos mundos diferentes: el real y el del espejo.

translation.en: These recordings were used in Terrence's trial.
translation.es: Estos videos se usaron en el juicio contra Terrence.

translation.en: You'll see they speak for themselves.
Why did you set the department store on fire?
In order to destroy the mirrors.
Only fire can destroy mirrors, isn't that right, doctor?
What made you think you absolutely had to destroy those mirrors, Terrence?
translation.es: ¿Qué le hizo creer que debía destruir esos espejos, Terrence?

translation.en: They killed my Helen... ...and my three children.
translation.es: Mataron a mi Helen y a mis tres hijos.

translation.en: For what reason? Why would mirrors want to kill your family?
translation.es: ¿Por qué motivo? ¿Por qué querrían matar a su familia?

translation.en: -Because I didn't.... -Didn't do what?
They asked me to find Esseker.
Oh, my God.
-We all are looking for Esseker. -Amy.
Excuse me, I have to go.
Tell me about Esseker, Terrence.
Who is Esseker?
I don't know who Esseker is!
I don't know who Esseker is!
I don't know!
Mrs. Carson? It's Rosa.
Mr. Ben is here.
He's moving all of the furniture around.
Hey. How was school today?
translation.es: Hola. ¿Cómo les fue en la escuela?

translation.en: Good.
Good. I'll be right back.
Dad?
Sweetheart, give me a second. I gotta take care of a couple things.
translation.es: Cariño, dame un segundo. Debo ocuparme de algo.

translation.en: Daddy, what are you doing?
Honey, don't look scared. Everything's fine.
translation.es: Cariño, no te asustes. Todo está bien.

translation.en: I think it looks nicer like this. Don't you?
translation.es: Creo que se ve mejor así, ¿no?

translation.en: Rosa, what's happening?
Take the kids downstairs, right now. Right now!
translation.es: Lleva a los niños abajo, ahora.

translation.en: What the hell are you doing?
You're gonna have to trust me, this is for your own protection.
translation.es: Confía en mí. Es para protegerte.

translation.en: Get out of the house, right now.
Are you listening to me?
You are scaring the kids. If you don't leave immediately...
translation.es: ¡Estás asustando a los niños! ¡Si no te vas...

translation.en: ...I'm calling the police and you will never see your kids again.
translation.es: ...llamaré a la Policía! ¡Y no volverás a ver a tus hijos!

translation.en: Amy, I am not crazy. These mirrors are dangerous.
translation.es: No estoy loco. Estos espejos son peligrosos.

translation.en: At first, I thought it was just the ones in the store, but after Angela was killed...
translation.es: Pensé que solo los de la tienda, pero después de lo de Ángela...

translation.en: ...I realized they can get at you anywhere.
I promise I will leave the house, just let me cover these damn mirrors.
translation.es: Te prometo que me iré. Solo déjame cubrir los espejos.

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
I know what you've been going through hasn't been easy.
translation.es: Sé que lo que has pasado no es fácil.

translation.en: But guess what. It hasn't been easy for us either.
translation.es: ¿Pero sabes qué? ¡Tampoco fue fácil para nosotros!

translation.en: Angela was a part of our lives too, you know that?
translation.es: Ángela también era parte de nuestras vidas, ¿sabes?

translation.en: It's not fair what you're doing to us, Ben!
translation.es: ¡Lo que nos estás haciendo no es justo, Ben!

translation.en: Michael.... He's acting so strange now.
He always wants to be alone, he won't talk to me, he's having nightmares.
translation.es: Siempre quiere estar solo. No me habla. Tiene pesadillas.

translation.en: Ben, your behavior is rubbing off on him.
He is 6 years old, I have to protect him.
I want to show you something.
Ben, let go of me!
You don't want to believe me? Fine, I'll show you.
-What are you doing? -I'll show you!
Are you crazy?!
-Have you gone completely mad? -Just wait, you'll see.
-See what? -You'll see.
See what, Ben? What am I supposed to see?
It's not happening.
It's not happening.
Amy, I swear to you, at the Mayflower....
translation.es: Amy, te lo juro, en Mayflower...

translation.en: I am not lying.
Ben, let's go back inside, okay?
Put the gun away.
Listen to me, baby. I want to help you.
Tell the kids I'm sorry.
translation.es: Dile a los niños que lo lamento.

translation.en: Ben!
No!
Jesus Christ.
Larry, it's me. I need your help again.
translation.es: Larry, soy yo. Necesito tu ayuda otra vez.

translation.en: I'm trying to locate the patient-employee manifest for St. Matthew's Hospital.
translation.es: Quiero la lista de empleados y pacientes del hospital St. Matthew's.

translation.en: -Where is it? -Where was it? They closed it down.
It was in New York, it's where the Mayflower used to be.
translation.es: Estaba en Nueva York. Donde estaba Mayflower.

translation.en: The Mayflower? The department store?
Do you know where they'd store records for a hospital...
translation.es: ¿Sabes dónde se guardan los registros de un hospital...

translation.en: ...that's been closed for over 50 years?
I don't. But I can send someone to city hall to check it out.
translation.es: No, pero enviaré a alguien al ayuntamiento a averiguar.

translation.en: If it's a public hospital, there'd be a record of it. Tell me exactly what you need.
translation.es: Ahí tienen los registros. Dime exactamente qué quieres.

translation.en: Same thing. I'm looking for a patient or an employee with the name Esseker.
translation.es: Lo mismo. Busco a un paciente o un empleado llamado Esseker.

translation.en: All right, I'm on it. Give me a couple hours, and Ben, keep your head down.
translation.es: Bien. Dame un par de horas, y ten cuidado.

translation.en: Hey.
-Did you get it? -Yeah, I think so.
It's Anna Esseker.
I didn't really know what you wanted, so I got all the medical files.
translation.es: No sabía qué querías, tomé los registros médicos.

translation.en: This is perfect, Larry. This is perfect.
What happened? Did you get in an accident?
Anna Esseker's file, did you have to go to city hall?
I didn't have to go anywhere. All the files in that place...
translation.es: No, no fui a ninguna parte. Estaban en la jefatura...

translation.en: ...were in storage with the cold-case evidence.
translation.es: ...con las pruebas del caso no resuelto.

translation.en: -Why, because of the fire? -No, no, it's before the fire.
It's a totally different case.
Anna was a patient at St. Matthew's.
translation.es: Anna era paciente en el St. Matthew's.

translation.en: She was in the psych ward run by a Dr. Kane.
translation.es: Estaba en el pabellón psiquiátrico dirigido por el doctor Kane.

translation.en: Now get this, she was only 12 years old when she died.
What?
When the nurses went on their rounds first thing in the morning October 6th, 1952...
translation.es: Cuando las enfermeras hicieron las rondas matinales... ...del 6 de octubre de 1952...

translation.en: ...they discovered that all the patients had left their rooms during the night.
translation.es: ...vieron que los pacientes habían dejado sus cuartos en la noche...

translation.en: They'd all gathered in the main hall. Ben, they were all dead, including the girl.
translation.es: ...y se reunieron en el salón central. Ben, todos estaban muertos, incluso la niña.

translation.en: Apparently, they killed each other. I mean, it was a slaughterhouse.
translation.es: Al parecer, se mataron entre sí. Fue una masacre.

translation.en: That's when they closed the place down. Who knows what really happened?
translation.es: Por eso cerraron el hospital. ¿Quién sabe qué ocurrió?

translation.en: What about the doctor? Kane?
They arrested him. They found him dead first day of the hearing.
translation.es: Lo arrestaron. Lo hallaron muerto el día de la audiencia.

translation.en: He slashed his wrists with a piece of the cell mirror.
translation.es: Se cortó las muñecas con un trozo de espejo de la celda.

translation.en: Thanks for your help.
Good luck.
Damn it!
Jesus.
"October 6th, 1952."
"Anna Esseker is diagnosed with severe schizophrenia, leading...
translation.es: "A Anna Esseker se le diagnosticó esquizofrenia grave...

translation.en: ...to withdrawal from reality, delusional and violent behavior."
translation.es: ...que llevó a una pérdida de la realidad, violencia y alucinaciones".

translation.en: "Pennsylvania, August 1951."
They don't match.
Anna Esseker was discharged from St. Matthew's Hospital October 4th.
translation.es: Anna Esseker fue dada de alta del hospital el 4 de octubre.

translation.en: Two days before the massacre.
translation.es: Dos días antes de la masacre.

translation.en: She's still alive, isn't she?
You almost done, sweetie?
Okay.
Why is Daddy acting so scared? It's not normal.
translation.es: ¿Por qué papá tiene tanto miedo? No es normal.

translation.en: He's way older than me.
And I'm not acting scared, but he is.
translation.es: Yo no tengo miedo, pero él sí.

translation.en: Doesn't make any sense. Michael? What are you doing?
Nothing.
Okay, well, we gotta get going, all right?
Okay.
Amy? Amy, what's wrong?
You have to come to the house right now.
translation.es: Debes venir a la casa enseguida.

translation.en: I'm so scared.
Amy, what's wrong? I'm so scared.
-Amy, just tell me what happened. -There's something in the house.
translation.es: -Dime qué sucede. -Hay algo en la casa.

translation.en: Something in the mirrors.
I'm on my way. Goddamn it!
Come on.
Dad? When are you coming back home?
Really soon, sweetheart. Come here.
I love you, Daddy.
I love you, too, sweetheart.
I gotta go.
I'm afraid to stay here.
There's gonna be windows and mirrors wherever you go.
translation.es: Adonde vayas habrá ventanas y espejos.

translation.en: Anything that causes a reflection right now is dangerous.
translation.es: Cualquier cosa que refleje es peligrosa.

translation.en: At least inside the house we covered everything. It's the safest place to be.
translation.es: Al menos aquí todo está cubierto. Es el lugar más seguro.

translation.en: Amy, I'm so sorry.
No. It's not your fault. I should've believed you.
translation.es: No. No es tu culpa. Debí creerte.

translation.en: Come here.
Ben, you do whatever it takes to end this.
translation.es: Ben, haz lo que debas hacer para ponerle fin a esto.

translation.en: You hear me? I will.
I'll be right back.
Jesus.
Yes, sir.
Excuse me. Is this the Esseker farm?
translation.es: Disculpa. ¿Es la granja de los Esseker?

translation.en: What is it, Jimmy?
I don't know, Ma. What can I do for you, sir?
translation.es: No lo sé, mamá. ¿En qué puedo ayudarlo, señor?

translation.en: I'm looking for Anna, Anna Esseker.
There's a man looking for.... You said "Anna"?
translation.es: Es un hombre que busca a... ¿Dijo Anna?

translation.en: Yes, Anna Esseker.
An Anna Esseker, Ma.
Look, I'm sorry to bother you, I must have the wrong place.
translation.es: Lamento haberte molestado. Debe ser el lugar equivocado.

translation.en: What is it you want with Anna Esseker?
I'm doing a research paper on schizophrenia.
I became familiar with Anna Esseker's case.
translation.es: Conozco el caso de Anna Esseker.

translation.en: I just wanted to ask her some questions.
Go tell Grandpa there's a man here who's asking about his sister.
translation.es: Dile al abuelo que hay un hombre que pregunta por su hermana.

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you.
Grandpa?
You know...
...up to this day, visions of Anna's fits still haunt me at night.
translation.es: ...aún ahora, la imagen de los ataques de Anna me acecha de noche.

translation.en: I helped my father fix up this part of the basement especially for her.
translation.es: Ayudé a mi padre a acondicionar el sótano especialmente para ella.

translation.en: Her fits were too violent.
My mother couldn't take her screams anymore.
translation.es: Mi madre ya no podía soportar sus gritos.

translation.en: We had every priest, doctor, healer, coming in from all over the county.
translation.es: Trajimos a sacerdotes, médicos y curanderos de todo el país,

translation.en: But no one could help her.
Finally, a Dr. Kane from New York...
translation.es: Finalmente, el doctor Kane de Nueva York...

translation.en: ...answered my parents' cries for help.
He rejected the idea of demonic possession...
translation.es: Rechazó la idea de una posesión demoníaca...

translation.en: ...said he didn't believe in it.
He was convinced Anna suffered from a rare form of personality disorder...
translation.es: Estaba convencido de que Anna sufría un trastorno de personalidad extraño...

translation.en: ...and mirrors could help her.
He wanted Anna under his care, at St. Matthew's.
translation.es: Quería tener a Anna a su cuidado en el St. Matthew's.

translation.en: My parents were very poor, but he agreed to cover all the costs of the hospital.
translation.es: Mis padres eran muy pobres... ...pero él se ofreció a cubrir todos los costos del hospital.

translation.en: Where did she go after the hospital?
Don't you know?
She died there with all of Kane's other patients.
translation.es: Murió ahí con los demás pacientes de Kane.

translation.en: Mr. Esseker, I read the file.
Anna left the hospital two days before the massacre.
translation.es: Anna salió del hospital dos días antes de la masacre.

translation.en: Dr. Kane altered the documents so she could disappear.
translation.es: El doctor Kane modificó el expediente para que pudiera desaparecer.

translation.en: Where did you get that document?
I need you to tell me where she went after St. Matthew's.
translation.es: Necesito que me diga adónde fue al salir de St. Matthew's.

translation.en: She came back and stayed with us for a while.
translation.es: Ella volvió y se quedó con nosotros un tiempo.

translation.en: What do you mean for a while?
What happened? Why did she leave?
I don't want to talk about that.
Why did she leave?
Because strange things started to happen in the house.
translation.es: Porque comenzaron a suceder cosas extrañas en la casa.

translation.en: With Anna?
No, not with Anna anymore. No, she was totally cured.
translation.es: No, con Anna no. Ella estaba totalmente curada.

translation.en: Strange things started to happen with the mirrors, didn't they?
Mr. Esseker, I need to know where Anna is now, it's a matter of life and death.
translation.es: Señor Esseker, necesito saber dónde está ella ahora. Es de vida o muerte.

translation.en: Do not make me threaten you.
translation.es: No me obligue a sacárselo por la fuerza.

translation.en: We sent her somewhere where mirrors are forbidden.
translation.es: La enviamos a un lugar donde los espejos están prohibidos.

translation.en: Where the mirrors couldn't find her.
translation.es: Donde los espejos no la encontrarían.

translation.en: Where? Where?!
St. Augustine's Monastery, on the road to Reedfield.
translation.es: Al monasterio San Agustín, camino a Reedfield.

translation.en: How can I help you?
I'm sorry to disturb you, Sister...
...but I've come to speak with a member of your community. Anna Esseker.
translation.es: ...pero quiero hablar con un miembro de su comunidad. Anna Esseker.

translation.en: Is she expecting you?
No, not really.
If you're not listed, I cannot help you, sir.
translation.es: Si no lo espera, no puedo ayudarlo.

translation.en: Can you at least tell her that I've come from New York...
translation.es: ¿Al menos podría decirle que vine desde Nueva York...

translation.en: ...to speak with her?
I work with Dr. Kane from St. Matthew's Hospital.
translation.es: Trabajo con el doctor Kane del hospital St. Matthew's.

translation.en: It's very important, please.
St. Matthew's closed down in 1952. Who are you?
translation.es: El hospital cerró en 1952. ¿Quién es usted?

translation.en: My name is Benjamin Carson.
I work as a night watchman on 6th Avenue in New York City.
translation.es: Trabajo como guardia nocturno en la Sexta Avenida en Nueva York...

translation.en: In the building that used to be St. Matthew's Hospital.
translation.es: ...en el edificio donde estaba el hospital.

translation.en: What is it you want, Mr. Carson?
My family is in danger.
And what's threatening them is asking for you.
translation.es: ...y lo que la amenaza la busca a usted.

translation.en: I came all this way to ask you...
...why the mirrors that were left over from St. Matthew's Hospital...
translation.es: ...porqué los espejos que quedaron del hospital...

translation.en: ...are so desperate to find you.
Please, Miss Esseker.
If you don't help me, I'm gonna lose the most important thing to me in this world...
translation.es: Si no me ayuda, perderé lo más importante que tengo en la vida...

translation.en: ...and that's my family.
Sit down, Mr. Carson.
The mirrors are merely windows on our world.
translation.es: Los espejos son solo ventanas que reflejan nuestro mundo.

translation.en: It is not the wish of the mirrors to find me...
translation.es: No son ellos los que quieren encontrarme...

translation.en: ...but of what is imprisoned inside them.
translation.es: ...sino lo que está atrapado en su interior.

translation.en: What is imprisoned inside them?
At the time...
...that I was at St. Matthew's...
...Dr. Kane's therapy for personality disorders...
translation.es: ...la terapia del doctor Kane para los trastornos de personalidad...

translation.en: ...consisted of locking the patient up in a mirrored room...
translation.es: ...consistía en encerrar al paciente en un cuarto de espejos...

translation.en: ...for several days on end...
...forcing them to confront their own image.
Dr. Kane was wrong about his theory.
translation.es: Pero el doctor Kane estaba equivocado.

translation.en: There is no cure for schizophrenia, Mr. Carson.
translation.es: No hay cura para la esquizofrenia, señor Carson.

translation.en: It was something else.
And whatever it was, it left me... ...and entered the mirrors.
translation.es: Y lo que haya sido, me abandonó y entró en los espejos.

translation.en: Since that day...
...it has been collecting the souls of the people it kills.
translation.es: ...ha estado recolectando las almas de la gente que mata.

translation.en: I'm sorry...
...but if I agree to go with you and return back to that place...
translation.es: ...pero si accedo a ir con usted y regreso a ese lugar...

translation.en: ...I will make it possible for the demon to cross the threshold...
...back into the real world.
Do you understand what that means for my family?
translation.es: ¿Sabe qué le sucederá a mi familia?

translation.en: You can't do this, you need to come back with me.
translation.es: No puede negarse. Debe volver conmigo.

translation.en: I'm going to pray for you and your family.
translation.es: Rezaré por usted y su familia.

translation.en: That's all I can do right now, Mr. Carson. I'm sorry.
translation.es: Es todo lo que puedo hacer ahora, señor Carson. Lo siento.

translation.en: God bless you.
Gary Lewis, Terrence Berry, and many other men... ...have died trying to find you.
translation.es: Gary Lewis, Terrence Berry y muchos más han muerto intentando encontrarla.

translation.en: And because they failed, their families died, too.
translation.es: Y como fallaron, sus familias murieron.

translation.en: Two days ago, my sister was murdered.
translation.es: Hace dos días mi hermana fue asesinada.

translation.en: My family will be next if you don't help me.
translation.es: Mi familia será la siguiente si no me ayuda.

translation.en: Please.
Please.
Wait, wait.
This is my family.
This is my wife Amy...
...and my daughter Daisy, and my son Michael.
translation.es: ...mi hija Daisy y mi hijo Michael.

translation.en: They're beautiful.
They're innocent, they've never hurt anybody.
translation.es: Son inocentes. No le hacen daño a nadie.

translation.en: Please.
Take the photo.
Just take the photo.
Look at them.
I'm sorry.
Who the hell do you think you are?
They're just kids!
-Hello? -Amy.
Ben, where are you? At the monastery.
-Did you find her? -Yes.
Did you talk to....
-Amy? -Michael?
Michael?
-Ben, hold on, Michael's gone. -What do you mean?
I don't know, I fell asleep with the kids on the bed and now I don't know where he is.
translation.es: No sé. Me dormí con los niños, y ahora no sé dónde está él. ¿Michael?

translation.en: Amy, what's going on? Is everything all right?
Oh, fuck.
Amy, what's going on? Have you got Michael?
Oh, my God.
Ben... ...there's water everywhere.
translation.es: Ben, hay agua por todas partes.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
You've gotta be careful of the water. It creates reflections.
translation.es: Debes tener cuidado con el agua. Genera reflejo.

translation.en: Someone is in the house.
Someone scraped all the mirrors!
Amy, where is Michael?
I don't know. I don't see him anywhere.
translation.es: No lo sé. No lo veo por ninguna parte.

translation.en: You've gotta stay away from the water.
Get the kids and stay away from the water!
translation.es: ¡Ve por los niños y aléjense del agua!

translation.en: -Michael? -Amy?
Amy?! Shit!
Which room is she in? Which one?
My family is not dying tonight. You are coming with me.
translation.es: Mi familia no morirá hoy. Usted vendrá conmigo.

translation.en: Michael?
Daisy?
Daisy, come here.
Come here, Daisy.
Mom?
Come here, sweetheart.
What are you doing in there?
Everything's gonna be all right.
No!
No!
Daisy!
Come here! Get down! Get down, right now!
Get down, sweetie. Get down. Oh, my God, are you okay?
translation.es: Siéntate, cariño. Siéntate. Por Dios, ¿estás bien?

translation.en: Oh, my God! Stay right there, don't move, baby. Don't move.
Mom, why did you do that to me?
It wasn't me, sweetheart. You know I would never hurt you.
translation.es: No fui yo, cariño. Sabes que jamás te lastimaría. Lo sabes.

translation.en: Here. Hold this. Hold it tight.
Okay?
Here, get down, sweetie. Let me see. Let me see.
Let me see, sweetie. It's gonna be okay.
All right? I know it hurts, stay right there.
translation.es: ¿De acuerdo? Sé que duele. Quédate ahí.

translation.en: Give me your hand. I need you to hold it really tight, okay?
translation.es: Dame la mano. Presiona fuerte, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: Just flat and tight, just like that. Okay.
Now, I need you to listen to me, okay, baby?
translation.es: Ahora quiero que me escuches, ¿sí, cariño?

translation.en: You have to be very brave. I need you to stay here no matter what happens.
translation.es: -Debes ser muy valiente. -De acuerdo. Debes quedarte aquí, no importa lo que pase.

translation.en: No matter what you hear. Do not move from this closet until I come back.
translation.es: No importa lo que escuches. No te muevas de aquí hasta que yo regrese.

translation.en: -You understand me, right? Okay. -Yes.
Okay.
Do not move. I love you.
Don't move.
Michael?
Michael?
Where are you?
Michael?
Michael!
Michael, what are you doing?
Don't be scared, Mommy. He just wants to play with us.
translation.es: No te asustes, mami. Solo quiere jugar con nosotros.

translation.en: Michael, I want you to drop that knife, right now.
translation.es: Michael, quiero que sueltes el cuchillo ahora mismo.

translation.en: Do you hear me?
You know very well you're not allowed to play with knives. Don't you?
translation.es: Sabes que no debes jugar con cuchillos.

translation.en: Come on.
That's a good boy.
Give me the knife, Michael.
Michael! Michael!
Michael?
Michael?
Michael?
Michael? Mike--?
Michael?
Why are you hiding from me, sweetheart?
Michael?
You okay? Come on.
It's waiting for me downstairs.
Bring me inside. From now on, I have to keep my eyes closed.
translation.es: Guíeme. A partir de ahora, debo mantener los ojos cerrados.

translation.en: Step up. You're in the room.
translation.es: Baje. Ya está en la habitación.

translation.en: Strap me in.
I spent the darkest days of my life in this room.
translation.es: Pasé los días más oscuros de mi vida en este cuarto.

translation.en: Are you sure there's no other way?
translation.es: ¿Segura de que no hay otra forma?

translation.en: This is for your family, Mr. Carson.
translation.es: Esto es por su familia, señor Carson.

translation.en: For your family.
Michael?
Michael? Michael, look at me.
Michael!
No, Michael!
Give him back to me!
No!
No! Get out!
No, Michael!
No!
Please. Please.
You must go now.
Thank you.
No!
Why?
Give him back!
Give him back! Give him back!
Michael!
No!
Michael? Oh, my baby!
Come on.
One, two, three....
Five, six....
Thank God!
Michael, I love you. I love you!
Anna!
Get away, you bitch!
Oh, my baby.
I love you.
I love you, guys.
